name: Ocean-Hued Clam
title: Memories of the Deep: Ocean-Hued Clam
desc: "Bringing hopes and memories from the depths, permeating long-lost civilizations and history, these graceful and exquisite crowns slide into the forgotten rifts with their owners."
in_play_description:
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2, Current healing received: ${[GCG_TOKEN_SHIELD]})
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.

skills.desc:
When played: Heal the attached character for 2 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2)
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
